shelters.description: Non Profit that has been catering to transient populations since 1992. Our mission is to provide perpetual sustenance programs to both adults and transitional age youth within the State of California

shelters.businessName: FAMILY PROMISE OF SACRAMENTO - EMERGENCY SHELTER
shelters.description: Providing a safe and comfortable living space where families can stay together is an essential part of the Family Promise mission.
Class of Housing: Emergency Shelter Program: lodging and meals for homeless single men and women for 30 to 120 days
We are not a shelter, we do have a motel voucher program for homeless families.
The development is comprised of 60 one bedroom cottages. The residential facility primarily serves single men or women, or a couple or parent with a child at these cottages

shelters.businessName: ST JOHNS SHELTER FOR WOMEN AND CHILDREN SACRAMENTO
shelters.description: We provide more than shelter and food. We provide the ability to rise above devastating, negative elements and achieve job-readiness and self-sustainability.
Provides a seven 7-night stay for single men. Be there at the black metal gate by 5:30 p.m. for a first come/first serve basis.

shelters.businessName: VOLUNTEERS OF AMERICA GREATER SACRAMENTO AND NORTHERN NEVADA - A STREET SHELTER (FOR MEN)
shelters.description: As many as 90 consecutive days of food, shelter and referral services are provided to homeless men at Volunteers of America's Men's Shelter.

medical.description: Offers medical services to indigent individuals and families
Offers medical services to indigent individuals and families
Offers medical services to indigent individuals and families

Free medical clinic center for people who do not have medical insurance. Not a walk in clinic so you must apply and provide proof of income, residency and ID. Two weeks waiting until seen. Please call for more information. Includes medical treatment of acute illnesses and minor injuries. Provides care of chronic illnesses such as diabetes, high blood pressure and asthma
Clinic is open on the 1st Saturday of each month from 1:00-6:00pm. No Fee-No co-pay
Offers clinic services to age group 21 and over. You must be receiving. CMISP. Provides primary care medical services to individuals and families who do not have medical insurance.

contacts.email: Offers primary care health services to adults and children that do not have medical insurance. Medical services include immunizations, STD's HIV diagnoses and family planning.

medical.description: Monday - Friday 8-5pm. Public health clinic services, well child exams, childrens checkups and pediatric immunizations. Offers family planning, pregnancy testing and STD diagnoses and treatment along with immunizations. Medical insurance accepted or fees vary according to eligibility for children with no health insurance within zip codes 95816, 95817, 95818, 95820, or Sacramento county.

medical.businessName: County of Sacramento Primary Care Clinic
medical.description: Monday - Friday 8-5pm. The Primary care clinic provides walk in non-emergency medical services to people with Medi-cal or no insurance
Provides primary and public health care medical service to homeless individuals and families who have no insurance.

medical.businessName: County of Sacramento Medically Indigent Services Program - CMISP
medical.description: Monday - Friday 8-5pm. Call for medical answering service assistance. Helpful for locating a CMISP clinic nearest you. Provides resources and referrals to Sacramento county residents with no insurance.
